channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: E.W.スクリプス社、ケイト・オブライアンをニュース担当社長に任命、スクリプスニュース、コートTV、地元メディア局のニュース業務全般を担当（ラジオ＆テレビビジネスレポート）
item.description:
Radio & Television Business Report:
The E.W. Scripps Company names Kate O'Brian as president of news, responsible for Scripps News, Court TV, and all news operations at local media stations  —  CINCINNATI — The E.W. Scripps Company has selected Kate O'Brian to fill the newly created role of President/News.

item.title: Substackがダイレクト・メッセージを初公開、1対1のプライベートな会話が可能に。デフォルトでは、ユーザーはつながっている相手からのDMしか受け取れない（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Substack debuts direct messaging, letting users have private one-on-one conversations; by default, users will only receive DMs from people they're connected to  —  Substack is introducing direct messaging, allowing users to have private one-on-one conversations, the company announced today.

item.title: ASCAP、2023年の売上高は前年比14.1％増の17億3,700万ドル、印税分配可能額は15億9,200万ドル、米公演収入は前年比12.6％増の13億2,700万ドルを突破（Jem Aswad/Variety）
item.description:
Jem Aswad / Variety:
ASCAP reports $1.737B in 2023 revenue, up 14.1% YoY, and $1.592B available for royalty distributions; US performance revenue surpassed $1.327B, up 12.6% YoY  —  The American Society of Composers, Authors and Publishers (ASCAP) announced record financial results for 2023 …

item.title: パラマウント、第4四半期の売上高は予想7.85億ドルに対し76.4億ドル、利益は前年同期の2,100万ドルから5.14億ドルへ、Paramount+の世界加入者数は410万人増の6,750万人（Laya Neelakandan/CNBC）
item.description:
Laya Neelakandan / CNBC:
Paramount reports Q4 revenue of $7.64B vs. $7.85B est., and profit of $514M, up from $21M the year prior; Paramount+ reached 67.5M global subscribers, up 4.1M  —  - Paramount Global missed revenue expectations for the fourth quarter Wednesday but posted a surprise quarterly profit …

item.title: Raw Story、AlterNet、そして別件でThe InterceptがOpenAIを著作権侵害でNY連邦裁判所に提訴、The Interceptはマイクロソフトも提訴（Yiwen Lu/New York Times）
item.description:
Yiwen Lu / New York Times:
Raw Story, AlterNet, and, in a separate case, The Intercept sue OpenAI in a NY federal court for copyright infringement; The Intercept is also suing Microsoft  —  Raw Story, AlterNet and The Intercept sued for copyright infringement over the way the ChatGPT creator trains its technology.

item.title: BBCによると、既存のコンテンツの再フォーマットや翻訳、ジャーナリスト向けの「ヘッドラインヘルパー」など、12のジェネレーティブAIパイロットを行っている（Rhodri Talfan Davies/BBC）
item.description:
Rhodri Talfan Davies / BBC:
The BBC says it is running 12 generative AI pilots, including reformatting and translating existing content and a “headline helper” for journalists  —  Rhodri Talfan Davies is the BBC's Director of Nations.  He's responsible for bringing teams together across the BBC to shape …

item.title: 情報筋エッセンス・マガジンの親会社が、2019年に女性向けライフスタイル・サイトを4億ドルで買収したヴァイス・メディアからリファイナリー29を買収する交渉に入っている（Alexandra Bruell/Wall Street Journal）。
item.description:
Alexandra Bruell / Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Essence Magazine's parent company is in talks to buy Refinery29 from Vice Media, which acquired the women's lifestyle site in 2019 for $400M  —  Vice, which acquired the women's lifestyle site in 2019 for $400 million, is retrenching under new ownership

item.title: ユニバーサルミュージック、人員削減と効率化により2026年までに年間2億7000万ドル以上の経費削減を計画、第4四半期の売上は前年同期比9％増の35億ドル（Thania Garcia/Variety）
item.description:
Thania Garcia / Variety:
Universal Music plans $270M+ in annual run-rate savings by 2026, through headcount reduction and efficiencies, and reports 9% YoY revenue growth in Q4 to $3.5B  —  In its latest earnings report, Universal Music Group touted top-selling acts including Taylor Swift, the Rolling Stones, Drake …

item.title: Netflix、スコット・スチューバーの後任に『レゴ』映画や『アバター：ラスト・エアベンダー』実写化のプロデューサー、ダン・リンを映画部門責任者に任命（Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Los Angeles Times:
Netflix names Dan Lin, the producer of the Lego movies and the live-action adaptation of Avatar: The Last Airbender, as head of film, replacing Scott Stuber  —  Netflix announced Wednesday that film producer Dan Lin has been tapped as chairman of the streaming company's film division, replacing longtime movie chief Scott Stuber.

item.title: 情報源センター・フォー・パブリック・インテグリティは、2023年の予算目標600万ドルに250万ドル足りず、競合他社との合併か閉鎖を検討している（Benjamin Mullin/New York Times）。
item.description:
Benjamin Mullin / New York Times:
Sources: The Center for Public Integrity is considering merging with a competitor or shutting down, after falling ~$2.5M short of its $6M budget goal for 2023  —  The nonprofit had a budget shortfall of roughly $2.5 million last year amid a difficult market for fund-raising.

item.title: 出典ディズニーは2015年と2016年にバイスを34億ドルで買収する交渉を行った。シェーン・スミスは2019年の契約で数百万ドルを受け取り、2024年末に終了すると見られている（Lachlan Cartwright/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Lachlan Cartwright / The Hollywood Reporter:
Source: Disney held talks in 2015 and 2016 about buying Vice for $3.4B; Shane Smith is believed to be paid millions in a 2019 deal finishing at the end of 2024  —  How did a Brooklyn media giant valued at $5.7 billion just a few years ago wind up going bankrupt and folding its newsroom?

item.title: 雑誌・新聞購読アプリ「Readly」の2023年末時点の完全有料会員数は前年比2.7％増の46万4000人、ARPUは2022年の7.80ポンドから9.10ポンドに上昇した（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）。
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Magazine and newspaper subscription app Readly had 464K full-paying subscribers at the end of 2023, up 2.7% YoY, and a £9.10 ARPU, up from £7.80 in 2022  —  Readly CEO Philip Lindqvist says there is still “ample” room to grow in UK and Europe.  —  The chief executive of …

item.title: タイム社のオーナー、マーク・ベニオフ氏が、ハワイの土地取得について調べている記者に、彼女の滞在先や家族の個人情報を知っていると語った（Dara Kerr/NPR）
item.description:
Dara Kerr / NPR:
Time owner Marc Benioff tells a reporter, who is looking into his Hawaii land acquisition, that he knows where she is staying and her family's personal details  —  WAIMEA, Hawaii — A life-size bronze statue of a cowboy sits at the center of Waimea.  The cowboy is riding a horse, lasso in hand, pursuing a wild bull.

item.title: アドビがProject Music GenAI Controlを発表、テキストの説明や参考メロディから音声を生成し、ユーザーが結果をカスタマイズできるプラットフォーム（Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Kyle Wiggers / TechCrunch:
Adobe unveils Project Music GenAI Control, a platform that can generate audio from text descriptions or a reference melody and let users customize the results  —  There's plenty of GenAI-powered music editing and creation tools out there, but Adobe wants to put its own spin on the concept.

item.title: ABCニュースのキンバリー・ゴドウィン社長は、一部のスタッフに宛てた電子メールの中で、トランプ大統領の黒人アメリカ人に関する最近の発言は「人種差別的だ」と述べた（Max Tani/Semafor）。
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
In an email to some staff, ABC News president Kimberly Godwin said Trump's recent comments about Black Americans were “as racist as they come”  —  The Scoop  —  Kimberly Godwin, the president of ABC News, said privately that recent comments by President Donald Trump about Black people were “as racist as they come.”
